scripts.tsc: pnpm run tsc:types && pnpm run tsc:cjs && pnpm run tsc:esm
scripts.tsc:cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && npx tsc --outDir dist/cjs --module CommonJS
scripts.tsc:esm: rm -rf dist/esm && npx tsc --outDir dist/esm --module ESNext
scripts.tsc:types: rm -rf dist/types && npx tsc --outDir dist/types --module ESNext --declaration true --emitDeclarationOnly true
